text: Ne mutiilane khumukoye kwa Nyasaye halala, ne mulakabukhana tawe, ne yitsulile tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye khwinywe, olwa mwali abeene khubeene abasuku, mana niyoongasia emioyo chienyu, ne khutsimbabaasi tsie nimuba abanaanda (beyinda ndala), ni mwali khulukuku lwelitukho lwomumulilo mana nabaresiakhwo. Na endio nilwa Nyasaye abenoosilinjia ebimanyisio bibie kho munyoole okhulunjikha
